newsitem.title: USA: Chromcraft Q4 net climbs after acquisition.
newsitem.headline: Chromcraft Q4 net climbs after acquisition.

text.p: Chromcraft Revington Inc said Wednesday earnings and sales in the fourth quarter ended December 31 benefitted from its purchase of Cochrane Furniture Co Inc in November and strong sales at its Chromcraft unit.

The company said net income reached $3.7 million, or $0.63 a share, compared to $3.1 million, or $0.53 a share one year ago. Sales in the period rose to $52.9 million from $40.2 million in the corresponding period in 1995.
Chromcraft designs and makes commercial and residential furniture.
Its shares were trading up 3/8 Wednesday at 28-3/4.
